name: Beginner's Piano
details: This course is designed for beginners who want to learn how to play the piano. No prior experience is required.

name: Intermediate Guitar
details: This course is designed for intermediate guitar players who want to enhance their skills and learn advanced techniques.

name: Advanced Violin
details: This course is designed for advanced violinists who want to refine their skills and explore complex musical pieces.
